Entries.default: You see a larger-than-usual eoten blocking the way to a village a ways beyond. It's busy arguing with itself and hasn't appeared to have noticed you yet.
The eoten sees you and immediately charges to attack.
You manage to find a path through the pass to sneak around the eoten.
As you're sneaking around the eoten, you slip on the sandy dunes and one of its heads whips over to look at you. It roars and charges.
As you're sneaking around the eoten, [SkillCheck 0] slips on the sandy dunes. One of the eoten's heads whips over to look at you. It roars and charges.
